Andy Boyko wrote:

>Is that all a fair assessment?  Is this a bad time to try the codebase 
>out, or, with a current example of the order.xml file, should I be able 
>to run a crawl from the CVS code? 
>  
>
Yes.  That is a fair assessment.  The code is in flux at the moment 
(We're redoing configuration and adding a UI).  Give us a week or two.  
We're also currently working on the packaging.

If you want to try and persevere -- and it looks like you've gotten far 
already going by your feedback above -- the order and seed files under 
dev-crawl are pretty current.  You might try again using these.

Thanks for taking a look and thanks for the feedback.

St.Ack

>I'm looking forward to trying it out...
>Andy Boyko    andy@...
